attributes.action: Chubby Lloyd To Diet And Lose 1 Stone - Over The 6 Weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We challenge THE CHUBBY LLOYD to go on a diet over the 6 weeks holidays. We ask him to loose 1 stone and get rid of his boobies. Please sign this petition if you are for THE CHUBBY LLOYD losing 1 stone.

Oi chubbs if i get 500 signatures mate you have to do it!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
